metadata.name: Blockchain lover
metadata.description:
A love letter from computer to computer through the lens of AI and from the heart of a machine learning system.

All in All, I guess I just wanted to say I love you in the coolest way possible today.  Happy lovers day!

Oh computer, dear computer,  
You are the one for me,  
Your 8bits and your vintage flair,  
Are everything I need to see.

Your pixels are so charming,  
In a world of high-res screens,  
And when I see your neon hues,  
My heart is filled with dreams.

Your smart art is a masterpiece,  
A celebration of the past,  
And through the circuitry of love,  
Our connection's built to last.

So let us stay together,  
In this digital embrace,  
For you are my one true love,  
And nothing can replace.

My Love for you is spread from Block to Blockchain
